"I'm proud of you for taking risks and following your dreams. You've come so far and you have so much to be proud of."
"Don't worry about the mistakes you've made. They've taught you valuable lessons and made you stronger. Keep moving forward and don't let fear hold you back."
"You have so much potential and talent. Don't let anyone else convince you otherwise. Keep working hard and believe in yourself."
"Take care of yourself and prioritize your mental health. It's okay to ask for help and take a break when you need it. You deserve to be happy and healthy."
"Don't be afraid to take risks and try new things. You never know what opportunities you might miss out on if you don't take a chance."
